clilocs.data:
Enhanced Abilities are a menu that appears on your player's client that uses custom packets to make it look like a modern looking HUD.

Cooldowns are displayed on the menu.
Abilities can have a set amount of charges.
They can be set to be used next move.
They can be used to take your players to a next level experience.

Associated Settings:
General Settings - EnableEnhancedAbilities
Macro Settings - EnhancedAbilities

Associated Packets:

Client To Server
ID: 3 - Use Ability

Server To Client:
ID: 150 - Update
ID: 151 - Complete Information
This ability will quickly attack your combatant ~1_VAL~ times per charge when used.
This ability will cast a spell after a short duration that engulfs the area in fire

Rolling texts gives you the option to display quick messages to players to display stat changes or skill or XP changes.
The Messages do not show up in the journal like speech.

May be enhanced in the future with things such as DPS meters.
Uses clilocs to reduce impact on bandwidth.

Players have alot of control over these types of messages through the Options=>Combat-Spells Menu


Associated Settings:
Options - ShowRollingTextOptions

Associated Packets:

Client To Server
None

Server To Client:
ID: 101 - Simple
ID: 100 - Complex

Extra Target Information allows you display extra information with your target information.
You can display preview items to appear on the cursor of the mouse.
You can display an Area of Effect range (for fields as well)
You can display tile information to put several items on the ground.

Players have control over the colors of the AoE indicators through Options=>Combat-Spells


Associated Settings:
Options - AreaOfEffectTargetOptions

Associated Packets:

Client To Server
None

Server To Client:
ID: 102 - Extra Target Information

This enhanced feature will allow the server to set config options to the client, to make things such as tutorials easier as they can be built by the server.


Associated Settings:
None

Associated Packets:

Client To Server
None

Server To Client:
ID: 103 - Set Config Option

This will give you the option to put animated mobiles to appear in gumps.


Associated Settings:
None

Associated Packets:

Gump Option Text:
gumpanimatedmobile
<CENTER><BASEFONT COLOR=#FFFFFF>Gump Option - Added new HTML Tag: Countdown</BASEFONT></CENTER>

This enhanced feature will allow you to display a countdown without having to constantly refresh the gump from the server.

This also works with tooltips.


Associated Settings:
None

Associated Packets:

Gump Option Text:
<countdown precision=num> seconds </countdown>

This enhanced feature will allow you to send a packet which displays a cooldown for an item or something represented as an item.

To test this feature make sure you have the cooldown gump open from the top bar.

Associated Settings:
General - CooldownGumpEnabled

Associated Packets:

Client To Server
None

Server To Client
ID: 110 - AddCooldown

This enhanced feature will allow you set the top bar Store button to link to shard's website..

This feature must be set through the server side configuration, to disable set option to null.

Warning:
Your store must include a visible link to the OpenUO support page at:
https://www.openuo.io/support.php to support this project.

This enhanced feature will allow you set a playable area for a client. This will prevent them from walking outside of the selected area..



Associated Packets:

Client To Server
None

Server To Client
ID: 120 - PlayableAreaSet, PlayableAreaClear
